description: This file defines the AppRouter class for a Flutter application, setting up application routes with authentication guards and route management logic. It includes route definitions, route generation, and navigation helpers, referencing various screens and models within the app.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A class responsible for route management within the Flutter app, including defining route constants, route factory with guard logic, and navigation helpers.

methods.name: initialRoute
methods.description: Returns the initial route string based on the user's authentication status.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on route name and arguments, applying authentication guards and handling specific parameterized routes.

methods.name: guardedPushNamed
methods.description: Helper method for navigation that checks authentication status before pushing a route; redirects to login if necessary.
